name: The Three-Body Problem
description:
COMING JUNE 1st! PRE-ORDER NOW for SPECIAL EARLY PRICE and BONUS SWAG!

These dark, deep woods are home to wild creatures and wild magic, and they're only dangerous if you disrespect either one. They're also your home. Here, you're safe, loved, and free, and tonight is a very special night; a good one for a ritual.

Until a stranger interrupts your plans, and turns your night, and your life in an entirely new direction.

A 9k piece of interactive fiction, featuring queer, polyamorous, celestial witches, non-explicit Dominant/submissive kink, consent negotiation, and a full moon. 

  • Note: There will be a mobile version coming soon from Tap/Wattpad! But the desktop version is bigger for Maximum Prettiness, and will score you Bonus Content!)

* * *
